A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Enjoyable\, it does actually feel like an old star wars movie (and not like one of the prequels) - however\, as a woman\, I'm not fond of the mary-sue issues with Rei. I would rather she be amazing because she worked hard to become so\, rather than just being badass \"because we have to fill diversity quotas.\" Way to reinforce the idea that women can't be the leader without outrageous circumstances or hand-outs from other women already in power.
